Package general

Class State

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
general.State
Direct Known Subclasses:
StoreState
public abstract class State extends Observable
Provides a foundational abstraction for managing the state of the simulation. This class holds the core state variables such as the simulation's current time and the running status. It extends Observable to implement the observer pattern.

  • Method Details

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Method that changes the state of the simulation to not run.

    • getRun

      public boolean getRun()
      Method that returns the state of whether the simulation should run or not.
      Returns:
      True if the simulation should continue running. Otherwise false.

    • getTimePassed

      public float getTimePassed()
      Retrieves the amount of time that has passed in the simulation.
      Returns:
      The elapsed time in the simulation.

    • setTimePassed

      public void setTimePassed(float newTimePassed)
      Updates the elapsed time in the simulation.
      Parameters:
      newTimePassed - The new time value to be set as the elapsed time.

    • notifyView

      public void notifyView()
      Notifies all observers of a change in the simulation's state. This method is called whenever the state changes in a way that observers, such as views displaying simulation data, need to be updated.
